title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing 'Default Text Editor' for an XML file (test.xml) in the Navigator, nothing happens, and it reactivates the scripted resource editor example.
EB: When selecting 'Open With...' and choosing 'Default Text Editor' for an XML file (test.xml) in the Navigator, a new editor should open for the file with the correct editor type, as it is different from the scripted resource editor example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
3. The editor used by default is the scripted resource editor example.
4. In the Navigator, select 'test.xml'.
5. Right-click and choose 'Open With...' > 'Default Text Editor'.
6. Observe that nothing happens, and the scripted resource editor example is reactivated.

Expected behavior: Selecting 'Default Text Editor' should open a new editor for 'test.xml' due to the different editor type.
